content.detailedDescription:
July 3, 2017 at approximately 8:45pm.
1st of 4 consecutive sightings, with in approximately 20 minutes. 
(i'm reporting them separately)

i was at a pre-4th of july party and we were at the end of the driveway in a residential neighborhood watching fireworks going off to the west, at the end of the street, a large reddish-orange very bright glowing orb just appeared in sky out of thin air, just to the left/south of the fireworks. there was no trail like would come with a firework. i watched it closely waiting to see if it was going to explode. when it did not, i knew it was something strange. it looked slightly hazy around the edges, as if the atmosphere was being disturbed around it. it hovered for about 2 minutes. long enough for me to run into the garage and grab my cell phone. i intended to video tape it, but being the dork i am, i had my iphone set to "photo" and not "video", so all while i thought i was getting amazing video, i had only taken one still photo! the orb was large at first. about the same size as the moon that night, then slowly got smaller until it was invisible.  another odd thing about it, as far as i could tell, base on the position of clouds and smoke in the air from fireworks, it didn't appear to be moving away, it just got smaller. i have never seen anything in the sky that i didn't think could be explained, i would love to know more about what i've seen. i also would like to know if anyone else reported seeing it.  there were other people out watching at the same time obviously. there were even neighbors a couple houses down out watching at the same time.  i was to embarrassed to go ask them what they thought about it.
content.summary: 1st of 4 consecutive sightings, with photo. while watching fireworks to the west, at end of street, bright reddish-orange glowing orb just appeared next to the fireworks. hovered for appox 2 min. size of moon, then slowly shrank until  became invisible.

content.detailedDescription: Seen ufo flying near my backyard again red orb central ny 9:30pm july 2 2017 then 10:30pm seen it hovering in the sky looked like a star im not sure if it was the same but was kinda red i shined a flashlight at it then it flew away after that ps we have a cat now the cat was acting weird last night & stayed at the back window thats why i looked out the window & saw it another ps the first time i was looking out nothing was there then all sudden the red orb just appeared outta nowhere in the sky and started flying around seen it for about 6 or 7 seconds﻿
content.summary: Red orb july 2 2017

content.detailedDescription:
Happened mid day while standing in front of the address mentioned, happened to look up to see a perfect white crescent shaped object resembling a waxing or waning moon only about 20% of the size passing directly over head from east to west which was the opposite direction to the cloud movement that day. it was quite easy to see and focus on, it was completely white and absolutely perfect in shape with no markings, windows or seams visible. it appeared to be at high altitude as it was well above the highest layer of clouds, possibly as high as a jumbo jet as after spending the rest of the day watching the sky i had noticed the only other objects above that cloud layer were jumbos, only if it was that high it was much larger and faster approximately 3 or 4 times the speed and over 4 times the wingspan, it could have been lower though, it was very hard to tell with such a smooth looking object. the object was only visible for about 15 seconds as its path took it behind a small cloud and it never appeared out the other side. i tried to bring it to my friends attention but by the time he was able to look up it was gone. feeling like he might think i was crazy i brushed it off.
now for some speculation..
at first glance i actually thought it was an extremely large spherical object passing earth through space. i know that sounds weird but its just the way it looked mostly due to how perfect the crescent shape was but when i realised i could not see the shaded part of the sphere as you would with a crescent moon i ruled that out it was also moving way to fast for that. it could be some kind of drone but ive never seen any aircraft that shape before, despite the hours of research ive done since and to my knowledge it doesnt make sense aerodynamically to make an aircraft that shape and it doesnt have any favourable stealth properties either... to my knowledge.  also its solid white colour and lack of markings just didnt seem right to me
content.summary: Perfect crescent shape (waxing/waning moon), white, moving at speed at high altitude

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to get fresh air. looked and saw a big red light passing over my head. no more than 200 feet above my apt. watched it acsend then slowly came down and i lost track of it north of me somewhere. watched for 5 mins.
content.summary: Big red light overflew my apt , not very high.

content.detailedDescription:
date: 17/06/2017
location: south leicestershire, uk
time: 08.35am
camera: nixon d5300 with a tamron 70-300mm lens.

i was making myself a cup tea and while waiting for the kettle to boil i went outside in the back garden to talk to my dad.

it was a beautiful morning, clear blue sky and i noticed a bright star like light appear from behind a row of trees at the bottom of my garden. it was travelling roughly from the west to the east in a straight line towards the morning sun.

i got a pair of binoculars from inside but couldn’t see much through them. so then i rushed to get my camera and took some photos.

the object was moving from right to left from my point of view and must have been very high. eventually it disappeared behind a roof, i did try to find it again from the front of my house but couldn’t see it.

 even zoomed in at 300mm there wasn’t much to see but when i zoomed in digitally afterwards i saw something really bizarre. a very bright (reflective?) object that seems to be kind of a vertical to the horzion hoop shape.

when looking at the photographs afterwards (i've got 20 in all) i also noticed a blurry spot (in the white circle) which i thought was a fleck of dust on the sensor until i browsed the other photos and saw that it moved from right to left and then disappeared when just below the main object.
 
i’ve searched around the internet to see if i can find anything at all that even looks remotely like it but have had no joy.

this is by far the strangest thing i’ve ever seen, because i saw it with my own eyes, it's difficult to stop thinking about it. it’s one thing seeing other people’s videos or photographs but it’s something else to see it with your own eyes.
content.summary: Outside talking and saw a bright light. fetched my camera and took some photos as it went across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in ibiza just outside san antonio and was taking a picture of the sunset. 
i had no idea of the object at the time and only noticed it later when looking at the photos i'd taken. having zoomed in on the anomolly it appears to be an actual object that i simply cannot explain. 
the picture was taken on a samsung s6 phone.
content.summary: Photograph of strange orb with surface lights.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo was i above the clouds in the stars. dropped altitude and disipeard and came back blinking with diffret colors it moved north, east, and west it was all over the place. when it would vanish it would come back with a huge ray of light and start blinking blue and white and the  vanish again and come back a blood red. it started to go down so far i thought it would vanish behind the mountains.... but it didn't it was over the spokane river and then went behind a tree and vanished. i thought it could be a drone but i fly drones and have never seen one go that high and have bright lights like that and the way it moved and the way it cut threw the air like water was pretty impressive.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a red star in the sky then it vanished and then came back and flew all over the place

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I first saw them about a year ago over the willamette river. the first of three that i saw, was hovering over the river at about 300 feet and proceeded to travel north slowly moving in a straight line with kind of a jerky motion from side to side as if it was changing direction in very small jumps but still going in the same direction. it traveled north for maybe one mile and then shot straight up to a high altitude and seemed to join with another craft was hovering to the north west. after about ten minutes, it separated from the other craft and descended to around 200 feet and illuminated the whole city block with a white light and moved over an office park and shot over the river to the east, and then joined up with a third craft, then flew together to the east. they were diamond shaped with a strange glow that would pulsate and seem to change color but i was unable to pin down a specific color. it was really odd. also, the object also seemed to be in more than one place at a time. as i was watching it, it appeared to be jumping to random places around it, not far, just a little bit, but enough to definitely notice. when the two objects came together, the light of the one that was at a higher altitude, glowed a lot brighter when they came together.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I first saw this exact ufo one year ago and have been seeing them regularly

content.detailedDescription:
in milwaukee wi off of 5th and walker, my fiancé and i were just finishing watching the nearby firework show from our fourth floor window. she happened to look outside after the fireworks had been finished around 11pm and noticed a very bright and clearly visible glowing reddish orange ball of light. she called me to the window, excitedly yelling for me to grab the binoculars and to see this strange sight. 
 
we knew that this was not a usual flying craft, since we live so close to a large airport. there were spotlights from a music festival nearby and constant airplane traffic overhead ( planes were at a much higher altitude).

 when viewing the ufo from the binoculars, we both witnessed that it seemed to be a transparent white color,while without viewing from them, seemed a reddish orange. 

 we followed the path of the ufo switching between normal eyesight and binocular view. it was on a straight path, constantly moving forward on a slight curve going west, northwest. we were both very excited. my fiancé was calling to the ufo to come back but after about 5 minutes we both lost visual when it continued it's same path and went behind a building where it was no longer visible.
content.summary: Bright light visible from 4th floor apartment window after watching milwaukee fireworks

content.detailedDescription: I do not know how to speak english, but i need to talk about the ships i've seen, too big i need to understand what they are, i need help, it's true and i know they are not from this planet. this is no joke, believe me, please. i await answers, thank you
content.summary: I need speask over my contact
content.locationName: São Paulo, State of São Paulo

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our back patio watching some fireworks in the distance. we saw an orange ball floating up to the sky from the tree line and thought it was a firework and was going to explode but it didn't. it began an arc to the left and up. it was definitely not shaped like a plane and did not move like a plane. it was moving slowly and then would hover completely stopped then move up a little and then continue on the arc until it got farther away and we couldn't see it anymore. then a few minutes later another orb appeared and did the same thing.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange orbs following path slowl then stopping then moving up then continuing.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside for some fresh air and immediately spotted something bright above me moving north. i looked up and saw a very bright reddish orange light with an aura surrounding it. it pulsated slowly from dim to very bright. i grabbed my binoculars from inside my door and looked closer. it was definitely not a plane or helicopter. it gave off no sound at all and was anywhere between 500 feet to 1 mile up so i got a very good look at it. i tried to get a picture but all i had was my cell phone and the picture did not come out too clear due to darkness.
content.summary: Bright redish-orange glowing orb slowly flying over my house moving northward

content.detailedDescription: Object seemed like a plane but came in fast, stopped at fireworks, hovered and went back in the direction it came. happened 3 times. 4 time it turned red and ascended at end of show. didn't look like a drone or lantern. it was too big, the way it moved very lucid. i was watching fireworks from my kitchen, they were coming from the field bear my house. this is where the ufo went. i was very excited, this is not my first sighting around this time of year. i lost sight when i went to the bathroom to change in case i needed to outside to get a better look.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object seemed like a plane but came in fast, stopped at fireworks, hovered and went back in the direction it came. happened 3 times. 4 time it turned red and ascended at end of show.

content.detailedDescription: This was not an aircraft i could identify.  hung in sky disappeared reappears hung there then disappeared again
content.summary: Metallic object appeared in sky at apt 15000 ft at app 30-40 miles in distance stationary in sky i am a private pilot of 47 years

content.detailedDescription: We were undertaking a paranormal investigation in the cemetery at redwood falls. there were six of us including two government workers, a doctor, an author and historian, and a journalist. at 10:30pm our compass suddenly went mad and started malfunctioning as did our gps device. our emf meters suddenly spiked into a reading of 25 milligaus. the radio scanner i was using (ghost box) started pulsing with a sound i had never heard before. all of this equipment was functioning perfectly before contact and after contact. it was a clear night with no cloud cover and the moon was behind us. temperature was in the low 60s. then we all witnessed a yellow large fireball slowly moving across the sky. it was bright yellow and emitted a bright flame like light. it sped up, slowed down, hovered, dropped altitude and then continued its path until out of sight. five minutes later a second ufo appeared. this one was more of a red and orange hue. it copied the exact flight pattern of the first ufo, the same movements like a mirror image. it was in the sky for the same time as the first one. then exactly at the same interval between the first two sightings a third ufo appeared with a yellow flame like the first one. it followed the exact same erratic flight path as the first two and was in the air for the same time. we have all of this recorded on our video recorder. we have the footage of all of the equipment malfunctions and readings (compass/gps/radio receiver/emf meters) plus the three ufos all unedited in one long clip. it was taken with a nightvision video camera. as well as our audio dvr recorders.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three ufos on the same flight path with 6 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my work truck this morning on 90 east heading towards 271 south. out in the distance i seen a chrome or mirror like beam happen in the sky right in front of me then all the sudden in the exact spot that the beam disappeared it reappeared and shot straight twords the ground. i don't know what to think and i am clueless who to talk to because everyone thinks i'm crazy. i am 40 years old and i don't make up stories so i thought that people would have believed me but i look like the crazy guy . please let me know what i seen, it wasn't a plane or a balloon.  it was a ufo.
content.summary: I was on 90 east and i saw a chrome beam shoot to the right then disappear and appear then shoot straight down then disappear.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was googling something about e = mc2 and why light has energy but no mass.

2. saw something outside window on 24th floor hovering.

3. it was sort of floating there somewhat, it looked blurry or refracted. it could have also been the same kind of effect you see when you see a coin or ring rotating on a table... sort of fuzzy, blurry edges. i feel like it made me think something if that makes sense. i can't really say what but i think it taught me something? i got up to go look at it because i thought it was a drone or a helicopter in the distance. it wasn't. it quickly changed directions and then shot of downward and disappeared all together or out of view.

4. i was curious as to what the object was. then became a little frightened because it was not a drone or anything that i could discern... it was moving too fast. the whole time i was looking at it i was extremely confused as to the 

5. it left my sight after a few seconds of looking at through my window. it descended. it was very close... i saw it against the skyline as well as against the building across the street which told me that whatever it was was extremely close. it zipped downwards and out of the view port of my window.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering outside window, communicated something i don't care to write. i went for a closer look, the thing descended then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: i live in kansas city, and while i was with a few of my friends at this spot that over looks the city i took a picture on snapchat. i swiped right a couple of times to find the right filter, posted it and kind of forgot about it. that is until i looked at the picture again in the morning and noticed something i hadn't seen before. in the middle left just above the city you can see 3 faint lights in the shape of a triangle that i am 100% positive were not stars or a plane or anything like that because we didn't even see the lights with our naked eyes. there is proof its not just a filter or smudge or anything because you can see a plane in the upper right corner of the picture. i decided to put the picture through a few other filters on an application on my desktop and could make out a kind of rim that was connecting the lights. although i'm not very proficient at photo editing. what do you think? i'm pretty spooked myself maybe someone who is more photographically proficient could give it a crack and see if they can find something more. i have attached the night picture that the object can be seen in, as well as a daytime picture of the spot we were during the event.
content.summary: Triangular lights spotted over downtown kansas city

content.detailedDescription:
This is reported via the meteorite store ufo service.

the individual reported to me that he believes he was abducted.  he mentioned a light green-gray metal table,  he believes he was probed, he was returned back his exact position in his bed.

the e-mail address listed is ours at martian materials meteorite store.   the name of the victim is joe artison currently lives at 508 west market street, pottsville, pa 17901

this event took place in 2007.
content.summary: Individual feels he was sat on a bench.  he can't remember more.

content.detailedDescription: Era um objeto brilhante e com uma rotação intensa em forma de esfera.
content.summary: Ocorreu na varanda da minha casa,olhei e avistei esse objeto redondo.

content.detailedDescription: While driving home on highway 175 i noticed a shiney object in the sky.  at first, i thought it was a plane but, there was no sound and it did not move.  i took 2 photos of the shiney object and was shocked at what appeared in the photos. after taking the 2 photos it disappeared.
content.summary: Driving home on highway 175, i noticed a shiney object in the sky.  at first, i thought it was a plane but, i did not see or hear one.  the object did not move!  i took 2 photos and was extremely shocked at what appeared in the photos.

content.detailedDescription: August 31 2012 i remember because i was moving into a new apartment, at approximately 9:30 pm i pulled into the parking lot got out of the car and noticed out of the corner of my eye a light that caught my attrition to the direct south on the horizon. at this point the light had no shape but appeared odd because i couldn’t process what i was seeing, it looked like the thrust that you see coming out of a large rocket only if it was a rocket the thrust would be directed down towards the ground, what was odd about this light was the thrust appeared to be directed up towards the sky and so i stood there trying to figure out what it was. it appeared to be moving upwards towards space, the light changed the higher up it seemed to go, like turning down a flame to a camping lantern and continued to diminish in intensity growing smaller until it was no longer observable. i processed this as some kind of rocket or jet that just went so far up into the sky that it was no longer visible, i turned my head to the left looked to the east and took about 3 steps in the direction of my apartment still processing what i saw and again something in that same area of the sky out of my right peripheral vision. i stopped looked to the right, in the south the object appeared to change from a light to a transparent orb, at that moment my thought was it’s like a photo negative, it’s there, moving but i can see through it, then i thought that what i first saw was not moving towards space but rather moving from south to north and then becoming stealth. the object or orb traveled in the sky at approximately 500 feet between south ave and southern blvd. headed north. just north of youngstown is the youngstown airport with a military base. as the orb got closer to my location i could see detail on the surface, interlocking triangles shifting in sequence only i can see through it and it was moving with no sound, looking exactly like the icon of epcot in the epcot center at the walt disney world resort in bay lake, florida, near orlando. as the object moved to the north and away from me red lights like powerful leds started going off then stopped. i called 911 and reported it, about 30 minutes later a black unmarked helicopter with search lights was seen looking for something.
content.summary: Observed light on the horizon, object changed into a dark transparent orb with patterns of triangles covering the surface and shifting in sequence.

content.detailedDescription:
i'm 99.9% sure i was abducted. back in 2002, i was at a concert at great woods in mansfield ma. after the concert, i went into the woods to urinate. mind you, i had not even a drop of alcohol or any mind altering substances. the parking lot was full with cars and people hanging out and tailgating. it was approximately 11:30pm. as i was peeing, i remember my body feeling weird and a bright, bright light, i can't explain the feeling in my body more then that. then,  nothing, absolutely nothing. i started walking back to the parking lot feeling a little disoriented, is the best word. as i stepped out of the woods i realized there was nobody there, no cars, no people. i was beyond scared. terrified absolutely bewildered. i walked to a gas station near by, looked at a clock and noticed it was 4:06am. i had to call my father to pick me up because my ride couldn't find me, even looking in the area i went to pee. at the time, my only conclusion was someone slipped me a mickey some how. i've been struggling with this for years. i haven't told a soul except my daughter who is 4 about being abducted. i told her when she was 2 so she has no clue. i think about it every day. i was of sound mind, i have no other theory then being abducted. i'm probably the worst witness because i don't remember anything that  happened other then a weird feeling and a bright light. i've thought about hypnosis but i don't want people to think i'm nuts. it's very difficult to deal with for me. you are the only place i have reached out to, to give me any kind of answer. i know there's not much to go on but that's all i got.  

p.H
content.summary: Abducted not a sighting of ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in bed at about 1.30/2 am in the morning and looked out of my window and seen this strange looking light at first i thought it could be a chinese larnten so i went and got my binoculars out and to my surprise i was a flying disk, but deeper that u normally see on the, it was like it had been dissorted they were multiple lights on it i'm not sure if they were all the same color but some were on and some were flashing, no aviation lights, i grabbed my phone to try get a photo but it was too fast and i've a broken leg in pot so it took me time to get to my front door to try spot it again i just seen a bit of it disapering over houses i went bk in to my bedoom went straight to my window and it was back were it had been and going in the same direction so this could of been a second one or the same one i'm not sure, but looked the same, when i saw it through the binoculars it was made of what looked like metal panals, it was the classic sharped flying disk but was deeper like it had been stretched from top to bottom very strange
content.summary: Seen strange lights so got binoculars out & was a deep looking disk with panals of metal, went over home then cam bk over, then went bk in first direction too quick to get photos

content.detailedDescription:
Past couple of months been watching something which regularly rises at same azmuth in morning sky, ~35 degrees off horizon, ese.  my location brambleton area, south loudoun county, va.  time 0445 hours.  weather clear.

did a 10 minute film clip with pocket camera, canon powershot a2500, mounted on tripod.  will try again tomorrow with better camera.

contact nat'l weather center.  no balloons released.  person i spoke with asked for copy of the video clip.
content.summary: White pulsating orb - northern virginia - 3 july 2017

content.detailedDescription: While coming back into my building at work i look up into the sky and saw a cigar shaped object that i first thought was a plane but it had no trail behind it. i watched it fly along for a few minutes and it flew into or behind a small cloud in stood there waiting for it to come out but it never did.
content.summary: I looked up to see a cigar shaped craft, not trail no sound went behind small cloud never came out.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from clermont indiana to brownsburg doing a delivery service app called doordash and i noticed a black disc in the sky. at first i thought it was a hot air balloon, but it never moved an inch for about 15-20minutes. i turned off of 136 heading to my home, observed what i thought was a hot air balloon still hadn't moved. i decided to drive closer to the object and stopped at a church parking lot, where i took a picture and recorded a short video. i got another delivery and had to drive to avon indiana, by the time i came back it was gone.
content.summary: Stationary sphere

content.detailedDescription: 3 small red wedges flashed/moved rapidly r to l. they  only  1 second then vanished.I had a camera but it occurred so rapidly that it would have been impossible to photograph
content.summary: 3 red wedges flashed/moved r to l for 1 second then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
After my morning jog, gazed at the sea while doing the stretching exercises.
on top of the horizon i noticed a light, which i thought was an airplane, i thought was flying very low.
from one moment to the another, a triangular red light begins to revolve around the light that i thought was an airplane. just as it appeared, it disappeared.
content.summary: I only saw lights, which i thought was a plane. what caught the attention was the red triangle around.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter was visiting for the weekend and were out in the driveway wathching for ufos. we watched them for years. they look like stars but are able to dim or completly turn offf thier lights. 
that night we were watching three of them at the same time. they were flying towards ea other from different directions. it took about 5 minutes for then to reach each other. the all flew into each other and became one bright light. less than a minute later as we were watching them, the ufos shined a bright beam of light on us. it took a split second for the light to reach us because of the distance. it shined right on us and i remember seing that rhe light was just on us and nothing around us. i screamed at my daughter and told her to run. we ran to the back of the house i think but i dont remember much after. it seemed like it was no big deal the next day. over the years ive had a growing urge to tell someone about what happened tho; so here i am.
content.summary: My daugjter and i watched three star like ufos join and then shine a spotlight on us
